title: SERIOUSLY?!?!
body: I just queued into a match and when banning a champ I had {{champion:41}} selected and changed it to {{champion:74}} and kept clicking ban but it wouldn't ban and the timer ran out and I got kicked and now I'm banned from queueing again. {{item:3070}}

replies.body: It sounds like you might be having a network issue that's causing you to lose sync in champion select.  I suggest following the troubleshoot steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions.
